lines.text: Boys, the honeymoon's over. From now on you're marines.
The dumber those guys get, the more stripes you get.
You oughta look like a zebra.

[Dressed in civilian clothes]
World, here I come!
Any you guys who don't like this hat, you can come out here and try to knock it off.
I think you're beautiful. Go on, on your way, civilian!
